options.sql: SELECT st_transform(the_geom_webmercator,32663) as the_geom_webmercator, alert FROM significant_month
options.cartocss: #significant_month { marker-fill-opacity: 0.9; marker-line-color: #FFF; marker-line-width: 0; marker-line-opacity: 1; marker-placement: point; marker-type: ellipse; marker-width: 10; marker-allow-overlap: true;} #significant_month[alert="green"] {marker-fill: #229A00; } #significant_month[alert="orange"] {marker-fill: #FF6600; } #significant_month[alert="yellow"] { marker-fill: #FFCC00; }
